title: Computer Vision Suite using OpenCV
features: Designed and deployed a real‑time face‑recognition attendance system with OpenCV and Python, achieving 98% identification accuracy across 4 diverse datasets and reducing manual check‑in time by 70%.

Implemented a parking space detection pipeline using YOLOv3 and custom image‑processing, integrating a live‑video feed to automatically map vacant spots, increasing parking utilization efficiency by 45%.
Built interactive gesture‑based controls and drag‑and‑drop UI components leveraging OpenCV and PyQt, enabling intuitive human‑computer interaction for non‑technical users.
